column1: Local Foods////One word to describe Local Foods when I finished eating....HAPPINESS. I was incredibly satisfied leaving Local Foods
column2: and the best part of it was that I convinced myself it was worth it to be stuffed silly to the core because all of it was LOCAL
column4: and HEALTHY! I went to Local Foods with 2 of my girlfriends
column5: and we ended up sharing our 3 entrees to try it all.
